thread.title: Kendall Jenner Takes to Social Media After Lamar Odom's Hospitalization
thread.title_full: Kendall Jenner Takes to Social Media After Lamar Odom's Hospitalization - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Kendall Jenner Takes to Social Media After Lamar Odom's Hospitalization
text: Kendall Jenner has taken to social media amid the tragic news that Lamar Odom has been hospitalized. “please don’t go,” the 19-year-old model wrote on her Twitter account. Lamar was married to Kendall‘s older half-sister Khloe Kardashian. Their divorce was finalized this summer. Lamar, 35, was found unconscious in a Las Vegas brothel on Tuesday [...] »
